description:
Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Unleashed Swan! A Reunion with Bon Clay!
Un cygne relâché ! Les retrouvailles avec Bonclay !
Встреча старых друзей! Вольный лебедь Бон Клэй
البجعة المحرّرة! لمّ شمل مع بون كوري!
解き放たれた白鳥[スワン]! 再会! ボン・クレー
